caption: It begins with something resembling a map, showing many castles and some trees. These castles are under construction, and the trees are growing, but they all appear to be made of building blocks. Then there's a scorching sun.Following that, inside a red tent, there are two individuals: a young man and an older-looking elder. The elder is dissecting a deer. He removes the internal organs from the belly and then skins the bottom. Throughout this process, they seem to be conversing. The elder appears to be reprimanding the young man. In the end, the elder completes the dissection and says a few words to the young man before departing.
